name: n8n-nodes-nkb-map-reducer
description: n8n community node package for Map and Reduce operations

scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && tsc && gulp build:icons
scripts.deploy: rimraf dist && npm version patch && npm run format && npm run build && tar -czf ./../n8n-docker-install/nodes/app-map-reducer.tar.gz LICENSE.md README.md dist index.js node_modules package.json
scripts.deployTest: rimraf dist && npm run format && npm run build && tar -czf ./../n8n-docker-install/nodes/app-map-reducer.tar.gz LICENSE.md README.md dist index.js node_modules package.json
